definitions.definition: To move (something) from one place to another.
definitions.example: Air conveys sound. Water is conveyed through the pipe.

definitions.definition: To take or carry (someone) from one place to another.
To communicate; to make known; to portray.
definitions.example: to convey an impression; to convey information
He conveyed ownership of the company to his daughter.

definitions.definition: To manage with privacy; to carry out.
To carry or take away secretly; to steal; to thieve.
